(Yanshosh, you mean Starscream, not Soundwave, right?"

Trainers.

Prebon, carrying Striker, and Ignatius, carrying Spears, entered the 
bridge of the Trainer base. Ignatius put Spears in one CR Chamber, 
and than put himself in another. Prebon laid Striker on a table. He 
called to Blaze.

"Where are Bullet and Hammer?"

"They are in the cargo room, building a new war suit."

"Oh. You knw how to do this though, right?"

"Yeah, I did it a few times before I met you, and the only time I 
didn't when I was in your command was for Bullet. He didn't see your 
vision."

"Good. It's time for Striker here to join us. I want all his programs 
revised so that he gives all loyalty to me. And when that's done, put 
him n the CR. He'll need massive repairs."

Blaze got to work re-programming Striker, while Prebon ent and looked 
out the main screen. He would have to revise his plan. He would have 
to find another way to control the Maximals. When Ramulus comes, they 
would ambush him and kill him. Than, with the Maximals all confused 
and scared, they would attack, with their new warrior Striker had the 
lead. They would be no match for this surprise attack, and they would 
fall, and they would all be re-programmed or given the chip. Either 
way, Prebon wins. He let out a maniacal laugh and walked away.
______________________________________________________________________
Starscream

"Gotcha!" he said to Zardus, as he went to jet mode and targeted 
Astral. He went up into the air, and than dived straight down with 
his lasers firing at Astral.
______________________________________________________________________
Gotron

"Alright! Come on, let's get moving." Gotron started galloping 
towards the Probe.
______________________________________________________________________
Vulois

Vulois took a small vile of liquid that was sitting on a shelf. He 
poured it on Eagle Eye's body, and the body began to melt and merge 
with the rock.

" It is sad. Their will be no Matrix for Eagle Eye. His spark was 
destroyed when he touched the evil Serpent AngelNemesis. But atleast 
his body can merge with this world, that he tried to bring peace too. 
How many of my friends will have to be lost before my mission is 
complete? HOW MANY!?!" Vulois left the room and entered his, locking 
the door.
______________________________________________________________________
Brix/Fliq

Brix and Fliq inserted their chips and looked at the group.

"Alright! Who's ready to kick some trainer butt!"
